com.codename1.rad.ui.chatroom

Class ChatRoomView.ViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.codename1.rad.models.Entity
        • com.codename1.rad.ui.chatroom.ChatRoomView.ViewModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    ChatRoomView<T extends com.codename1.rad.models.Entity>

    public static class ChatRoomView.ViewModel
extends com.codename1.rad.models.Entity

    A reference view model for the ChatRoomView. You do NOT need to use this class for your view model as long as your own view model includes at least properties with the messagesTag and inputBufferTag.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • inputBuffer

        public static com.codename1.rad.models.StringProperty inputBuffer

        InputBuffer property, which is bound to the text field for entering messages.

        See Also:
        inputBufferTag

      • messages

        public static com.codename1.rad.models.ListProperty messages

        Messages property, which contains a list of chat messages to display in the chat room. See ChatBubbleView.ViewModel for a reference implementation of an entity that can be used as the model for a chat message, and description of which tags a custom entity must implement to be used as a chat message view model.

        See Also:
        messagesTag, ChatBubbleView.ViewModel

      • participants

        public static com.codename1.rad.models.ListProperty participants

        Participants property, which contains a list of participants in this chat room. Individual participants can be any entity type that implements the Thing#name tag.

      • inputBufferTag

        public static final com.codename1.rad.models.Tag inputBufferTag

        Tag used to mark the "input buffer" property on an entity. This is the one required tag for an entity that you want to use as a view model for a ChatRoomView.

      • participantsTag

        public static final com.codename1.rad.models.Tag participantsTag

        Tag used to mark the "participants" property of an entity. This is an optional tag. If present, the ChatRoomView will be able to display avatars of the chatroom’s participants in the header.

      • messagesTag

        public static final com.codename1.rad.models.Tag messagesTag

        Tag used to mark the "messages" property of an entity. This is a required tag, and the property that is tagged with this should be an entity list containing "chat message" entities. See ChatBubbleView.ViewModel for a reference implementation of a chat message entity, and instructions on using your own custom entities for chat messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewModel

        public ViewModel()

    • Method Detail

      • inputBuffer

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel inputBuffer(String string)

        Sets the contents of the input buffer property. The input buffer property is bound to the text field that allows the user to enter text messages.

        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:

      • addMessages

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel addMessages(com.codename1.rad.models.Entity... entities)

        Adds chat messages to the chat room.

        Parameters:
        entities - "Chat message" entities to add. See ChatBubbleView.ViewModel for a reference implementation of a "chat message" entity, and instructions on using custom entities as "chat messages".
        Returns:
        Self for chaining.

      • removeMessages

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel removeMessages(com.codename1.rad.models.Entity... entities)

        Removes chat messages from the chat room.

        Parameters:
        entities - "Chat message" entities to add. See ChatBubbleView.ViewModel for a reference implementation of a "chat message" entity, and instructions on using custom entities as "chat messages".
        Returns:

      • addParticipants

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel addParticipants(com.codename1.rad.models.Entity... entities)

        Adds participants to the chat room. Individual participants can be any entity type that implements the Thing#name tag.

        Parameters:
        entities - Participants to add. These can be any entity with a property tagged with Thing#name.
        Returns:

      • removeParticipants

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel removeParticipants(com.codename1.rad.models.Entity... entities)

      • getInputBuffer

        public String getInputBuffer()

        Gets the input buffer string.

        Returns:

      • getParticipants

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel.Participants getParticipants()

        Gets the participants. Individual participants can be any entity type that implements the Thing#name tag.

        Returns:

      • getMessages

        public ChatRoomView.ViewModel.ChatMessages getMessages()

        Gets the chat messages in this room. See ChatBubbleView.ViewModel for a reference implementation of a "chat message" entity, and instructions on using custom entities as "chat messages".

        Returns:
